name: The Life Of Night City
desc: Help Cops with Quota. Take a hit mission for corpo ladies. Experience a more mixed crowd. The City is Lively!
author: RedRockStudio (Eli, Drew, Donk)

changelog.desc:
(Hotfix date 11-13-2022)
 -Changed the Structure of Radiant Missions. They now act as a function, rather than a mission script.
 -Fixed Bounty and Escort radiants from being completed.
 -Fixed Quota Missions not being completeable.
 -Made Quota missions feel more like a mission

extranote: YOU MUST COMPLETE THE VOODOOBOY ARC OF THE STORY TO SEE CROWDS AND DO RADIANT MISSIONS.
